text: I started coding by building simple games in Java.
I was part of the winning team of the CM1-CM2 middle school Handball match.
I actually learned Python after three other langages.
My favorite game is OFF (2008).
I had a pet bunny and later on a cat.
I love learning about 70~80's software and hardware.
I love reading books, especially dystopian novels.
I have four siblings.
I own clothing older than me.
My favorite cheese is Morbier.
My favorite music genre is Dark Ambient.
My favorite album is 'Achievement' by 'pilotredsun' (2016).
I love rainy weather.
I once broke a machine learning model and made it get worse over time, a machine forgetting model if you will.
I tried to play Chess but I was terrible at it.
I have (painful) experience with both front-end and back-end web development.
I was solving problems and puzzles when I was younger. I still do, but with code now.
I once lost a day working on a project because electricity went out and the save was corrupted.
I enjoy collaborating on creative coding projects. Everyone brings something unique to the table.
I enjoy watching tech meetups and conferences.
I love experimenting with generative art using code.
I am a big fan of classic video games from the 80s and 90s.
I went to a five stars hotel once.
